01About Me

Why I Want to Become a Front End Developer?

I was always interested in communication between people, especially in languages. But over the years I have also become more and more fascinated by both visual and electronic means of communication.

Whatâ€™s more, I feel sick and tired of hearing that my ideas cannot be realised due to technical limitations. While complaining about joyless tools I had to work on I always thought that I would do it somehow better if I were allowed to. I slowly started to believe that I can really do it in a better way - more intuitive, more elegant, smarter and even cleaner and better coded. I decided I give it a go.

Everything started on a Python course at my previous job. Since that time I have been learning how to code and it is just over a year now. I attended two very short programming courses, but I am mostly a self-taught developer.

Currently I am looking for a job as Junior Front End Developer.

Pure JS Clocks with Neon Glow Effect

The aim of this project was to get more familiar with Date object and some CSS3 properties such as box-shadow, text-shadow, border-radius, animations and CSS variables. I wanted also to use any other Web Fonts that Google Fonts to practise using @font-face.
